meaning: As She bestowed the kingdoms (rājya) on to the Lords of the eight directions (ashta dik pālaka), She is Rājya dāyini.
commentary: She bestowed the kingship over Brahma loka, Vaikuntha and Kailasa to Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva respectively. She then allotted Heaven (swarga) to Indra, Tejovati to Lord Agni (fire god), Samyamani to Lord Yama (Lord of death), Krishnāngana to Nirriti, Shraddhavati to Lord Varuna, Gandhavati to Lord Vayu, Alakapuri to Kubera and Yashovati to Eshana.
